column5: Just watched the episode of Tonyb with Aaron Shirley and I was impressed.  Tony you are a natural and I thorougly enjoyed watching the show. Makes me want to go fishing.  WTG guys awesome job and coverage.  Best regards, Sam
only caught the last 10 minutes  , but it was a good 10 minutes    Sorry I missed the whole thing.  Maureen
Yup, just watched it all myself Sam, great episode. Tony was a natural in front of the camera, but that is probably because he knows his stuff, having seen his reports here.
Real good job there Tony  . Well spoken and some good pointers. Looked like you guys really did have some fun on the water.
